title: Bug 35156 - Ctrl+F1 works only on some fields in the help search
description: When using the Ctrl+F1 keyboard shortcut in the help search feature, it seems to work inconsistently, not providing information for all fields or components. This behavior is unexpected and needs to be addressed.
OB: When I press Ctrl+F1 in the help search, it provides information for some fields or components, but not for all. It appears to be working selectively.
EB: I expect Ctrl+F1 to work consistently in the help search and provide information for all fields and components. It should not be selective in its behavior.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the software and access the help search feature.
2. Use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+F1 in the help search.
3. Observe that it does not consistently provide information for all fields or components.
